text: Dwight Kurt Schrute III (; born January 20, 1968) is a character on The Office played by Rainn Wilson. He is one of the highest-ranking salesmen as well as assistant to the regional manager (disputed)"Traveling Salesman", The Office Season Three (US/NBC Version), 2007, Los Angeles, CA: Universal Studios. at the paper company Dunder Mifflin. Schrute is known for his lack of social skills and common sense, his love for martial arts and the justice system, and his office rivalry with fellow salesman Jim Halpert. He is also known for his romantic relationship with Angela. Dwight was also the Vice President of Special Projects Development for the Sabre Corporation, but was soon replaced by Todd Packer, who was almost immediately terminated. In the final season, Dwight is finally offered the position of permanent Regional Manager. ==Notes== Category:The Office (U.S. TV series) characters
title: Dwight Schrute
